paper_abstract: This paper presents the stability analysis for continuous-time Takagi-Sugeno fuzzy systems using a fuzzy Lyapunov function. The proposed fuzzy Lyapunov function involves the time derivatives of states to include new free matrices in the LMI stability conditions. These free matrices extend the solution space for Linear Matrix Inequalities (LMIs) problems. Numerical examples illustrate the effectiveness of the proposed methods.
paper_title: Relaxed Stability Condition for T-S Fuzzy Systems Using a New Fuzzy Lyapunov Function
